content:
jazz and two e Hours

Enjoy live jazz, Thursday - Saturday from 6:30pm - 9:30pm with our artist-in-residence, internationally renowned musician Antonio Ciacca and discover Two E's new Icons of Jazz  series featuring Antonio & special guests! Food & beverage minimum and advance reservations required

Theater Pizzazz review of Icons of Jazz

 Two E Bar/Lounge is open everyday from 2pm to 10pm

Afternoon Tea Menu: 2pm - 6pm

Bar Menu: 2pm - 10pm

For reservations or to further inquire about private event bookings, please contact Two E Bar & Lounge, at 212 940 8113 or TwoE@tajhotels.com
